meanings.definition: A type of rock composed of fossilized crinoids.
meanings.sent1: The encrinite found in the cave was millions of years old.
meanings.sent2: The encrinite on the beach was a beautiful sight to see.
meanings.sent3: The encrinite rock seemed to whisper ancient stories to those who listened closely.
meanings.sent4: The encrinite formations resembled a frozen dance of sea creatures.
meanings.sent5: The encrinite sparkled in the sunlight, revealing its hidden secrets.

meanings.sent1: The encrinite wall in the museum displayed the beauty of ancient marine life.
meanings.sent2: The encrinite statue in the park was a unique tribute to the past.
meanings.sent3: The encrinite pathway felt like walking through a fossilized garden.
meanings.sent4: Her encrinite jewelry shone with a timeless elegance.
meanings.sent5: The encrinite building stood as a testament to the enduring nature of crinoids.
